library(testwhat)
library(mlr)
library(kknn)

errorToMessage = function (expr)
{
  e = try(expr = expr, silent = TRUE)
  if (inherits(e, "try-error"))
    return(list(message = attr(e, "condition")$message, correct = FALSE, location = "append"))
  return(NULL)
}
